---
title: ""  # Empty title to remove the text
listing:
  contents:
    - "*/*/*/*.qmd"
    - "projects/*/*.qmd"
  sort: "date desc"
  type: default
  categories: true
  sort-ui: false
  filter-ui: true 
  fields: [date, title, author, image, description, categories]
page-layout: full
title-block-banner: false # Disable the banner to remove the top colored bar

format:
  html:
    css: _articles.css
    body-classes: article-listing-page
    include-after-body: 
      text: |
        <script>
          document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
            // --- 1. Select Elements ---
            const sidebar = document.querySelector('#quarto-margin-sidebar');
            const searchBar = document.querySelector('.quarto-listing-filter');
            const tagsSection = document.querySelector('.tag-cloud-wrapper');
            const categoryTitle = document.querySelector('.quarto-listing-category-title');
            const categoryList = document.querySelector('.quarto-listing-category');

            // --- 2. Move Search Bar to Top of Sidebar ---
            if (sidebar && searchBar) {
              sidebar.insertBefore(searchBar, sidebar.firstChild);
              
              // Create "Search" Label
              const label = document.createElement('h5');
              label.className = 'sidebar-label search-label'; 
              label.innerText = 'Search';
              sidebar.insertBefore(label, searchBar);
            }

            // --- 3. Enable Collapsible Categories (Accordion) ---
            if (categoryTitle && categoryList) {
              categoryTitle.classList.add('collapsible-trigger');
              
              // Click Listener to toggle fold
              categoryTitle.addEventListener('click', function() {
                categoryList.classList.toggle('collapsed');
                categoryTitle.classList.toggle('active');
              });
            }

            // --- 4. Move Tags Section to Bottom of Sidebar ---
            if (sidebar && tagsSection) {
              sidebar.appendChild(tagsSection);
            }
          });
        </script>
---
